#labels Featured
= The Usual Suspects =

_Note: recursive functions require 'my' (at the moment)._

== Factorial ==
{{{
my.fact = {|x|
        true? x == 0, 1, { x * my.fact(x - 1)}
}

p fact 5
}}}

== Fibonacci ==

{{{
my.fibonacci = { |x|
        true? x == 0,
                0,
                { true? x == 1,
                        1,
                        {
                                fibonacci(x - 1) + fibonacci(x - 2)}};
                        }

p fibonacci 10
}}}
